Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Removes restrictions on the frequency certain authorized organizations may conduct bingo games
Summary: Removes restrictions on the frequency certain authorized organizations may conduct bingo games.
LawCode: Amd ยง495-a, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to removing restrictions on the frequency certain authorized organizations may conduct bingo games
